gen_z.description: Generation Z consumers (born 1997-2012) value authenticity, social responsibility, and digital-native experiences. They prefer bold, vibrant visuals, diverse representation, and content that feels genuine and unpolished. They respond well to memes, trends, and values-driven messaging.

parents.description: Parents (typically ages 30-50) prioritize family, safety, and value. They appreciate warm, trustworthy imagery that emphasizes quality, durability, and family-friendly aspects. They prefer clear, straightforward messaging and visuals that show real-world use cases.

professionals.description: Professional consumers (typically ages 25-55) value efficiency, sophistication, and premium quality. They prefer clean, minimalist designs, corporate aesthetics, and imagery that conveys success, reliability, and modern technology.
